title: Calories in a Clementine
meta_description: Discover calories in a clementine, including carbs, fiber, sugars, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown per fruit.
assumptions: Medium clementine (~74 g edible portion), fresh, peeled, no added sugar or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, variety, ripeness, and growing conditions. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One medium clementine provides ~35 kcal and is a good source of vitamin C and fiber.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Clementine segments with 1 oz Greek yogurt

faqs.q: How many calories in a clementine?
faqs.a: About 35 kcal for one medium clementine.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a clementine?
faqs.a: Approximately 8.9 g carbs, including 1.7 g fiber and 7.2 g sugars.

faqs.q: Is a clementine low in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, only 0.1 g total fat and no saturated or trans fats.

faqs.q: How much protein in one clementine?
faqs.a: Roughly 0.6 g protein per medium clementine.

faqs.q: Do clementines have cholesterol or sodium?
faqs.a: Zero cholesterol and just 1 mg sodium per fruit.
